definition: to substitute for/to take the place of/to replace/for/on behalf of/to stand in for
to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: One relatively harmless alternative to sun tanning is to use self-tanning lotions.
sentences.chinese: 相对无害的替代办法之一是利用太阳鞣自我鞣洗剂。

sentences.english: To establish a fund for replacing depreciable assets.
sentences.chinese: 设立一个基金来替代折旧的资产。

sentences.english: Alterna Professional Haircare uses caviar extract in its Caviar Anti-Aging collection.
sentences.chinese: 替代专业护发品使用鱼子酱提取的鱼子酱抗衰老收集。

sentences.english: Might UAVs eventually replace manned combat aircraft altogether?
sentences.chinese: 那么无人机是否可能完全替代人工驾驶的战斗机？

sentences.english: A complex short circuit capacity method is proposed as an alternative to the per unit method.
sentences.chinese: 复数短路容量法可替代常规的标么值法。

sentences.english: We are replacing the graph by its tangent plane.
sentences.chinese: 我们用函数的切平面来替代它的图像。

sentences.english: Ceramic restorative material is the best living substitutive material for natural tooth.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷修复材料是最自然逼真的牙体组织人工替代材料。

sentences.english: Being applicable at low temperatures it offers a suitable alternative to coal tar epoxy.
sentences.chinese: 低温时，可作为环氧煤焦沥青漆的替代物。

sentences.english: Anti-Xa activity is an acceptable alternate method to monitor heparin therapy.
sentences.chinese: 抗X因子活性是可接受的检测肝素治疗的替代方法。

sentences.english: The development of new, alternative insecticides is an expensive and long-term endeavour.
sentences.chinese: 新的替代杀虫剂的研发是一项昂贵的长期努力。

sentences.english: Excellent alternative to MMS, send files and photos over GPRS.
sentences.chinese: 优秀的替代彩信，通过GPRS发送文件和照片。

sentences.english: It is a part of their sexuality, not a partner replacement.
sentences.chinese: 这是他们性生活的一部分，性伴侣替代不了的。

sentences.english: A partition surfaced in foil wall covering stands in lieu of a headboard.
sentences.chinese: 一面金属箔片饰面的隔墙替代了床头板原先的位置。

sentences.english: There's another alternative that we will briefly discuss.
sentences.chinese: 我们还将简单讨论另外一个替代选择。

sentences.english: Since replacement costs are only part of the profits, net profits are higher.
sentences.chinese: 因为替代成本仅仅是利润的一部分，所以净利润更高。

sentences.english: We remind clinician that it must be cautious when they applicate hormone replacement therapy.
sentences.chinese: 提醒临床医生应慎用激素替代疗法。

definition: to replace/to take the place of
to exchange/to replace/to substitute for/to switch
to change over to/to switch to/to use (sth different)
to fill a gap/to fill in a blank (on a form)/to overcome a deficiency
to use/to employ/to apply/to make use of
to complement/to make up for a deficiency
to serve as/to act as/to play the role of
to drive/to propel/drive (vehicle wheel)/drive mechanism (tape or disk)/device driver (computing software)
